parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Dometic Refrigerator Safety Recall and Fire Hazard
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Dometic refrigerator can cause a fire hazard, leading to potential damage to the vehicle and risk to the occupants.
symptoms: The refrigerator suddenly stops working
catches on fire when switched to gas operation
spills a yellow oily liquid
and emits a strong ammonia smell.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure to Honor Recall and Repair
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The manufacturer's failure to honor the recall and repair can lead to continued safety risks and potential harm to the occupants.
symptoms: The manufacturer refuses to replace or repair the defective unit
despite the recall notice.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Microwave Oven Circuit Short and Recall
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The microwave oven circuit short can cause a fire hazard, leading to potential damage to the vehicle and risk to the occupants.
symptoms: The consumer is unable to get information on how to get the recall repaired
despite contacting the manufacturer multiple times.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Holding Tank Failure and Lack of Support
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water holding tanks can cause damage to the vehicle and potential harm to the occupants.
symptoms: The plastic tanks bend up when heated
and two of the tanks fell onto the road while the vehicle was being driven.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical Fire Hazard in Inverter Box
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical fire in the inverter box can cause damage to the vehicle and potential harm to the occupants.
symptoms: Smoke comes from the panel
and wires in the inverter box are on fire
melting all wires.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the leaf spring bracket can cause the rear tire to blow out, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The leaf spring bracket breaks while driving
causing the rear tire to blow out
the axle to disconnect from the vehicle
and the vehicle to shift
potentially leading to additional tire blowouts.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Frame Failure and Structural Integrity Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the frame can cause the loss of structural integrity, leading to catastrophic consequences, such as accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when driving on mountain roads or at high speeds.
symptoms: Stress cracks
metal fatigue
and failure of the frame
particularly in the area of the rear support bracket for the wheel springs
leading to detachment of the bracket and potential loss of control of the vehicle.
